participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring her interests and seeks balance between her passions and practical health.
participant_1.background: I spend a lot of my free time researching and buying teapots. I love to dress up but it's not all about the look, I like to keep my feet on the ground. I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time. I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health. I love to ride bikes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Social and playful, Jake enjoys physical activities and values friendships, often using humor to lighten the mood.
participant_2.background: I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends. My sister is a guitarist. I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world. I always think people are looking at me. Coffee and books are my best friends.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well, thanks!  How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks!  I'm excited for the weekend.
Me too!  I'm going to play tennis with my friends.
That sounds fun!  I love playing tennis.
Me too!  It's a great workout and a lot of fun.
Do you play any other sports?
I used to play basketball, but I don't play it as much anymore.
I used to play basketball too, but I got too tall and wasn't very good at it.
Haha!  I'm not very tall, so that was never a problem for me.
I love to read!  I'm always reading something.
What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but I really like historical fiction.
I love historical fiction too!  It's so interesting to learn about different time periods.
I know, right?  It's like you're transported to another world.
